tool_description: Arabic Books Library is a library that gives you thousands of arabic books.
name: arabic-books-library
title: arabic-books-library

api_list.name: Get Book Details
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://arabic-books-library.p.rapidapi.com/books/60825852"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "arabic-books-library.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://arabic-books-library.p.rapidapi.com/books/{bookid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "arabic-books-library.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
